pages.text: While Terramity is perfectly playable in a singleplayer world, multiplayer is recommended for both co-op and PvP.$(br2)Terramity features multiplayer boss health scaling, meaning the more players in a boss arena, the more health the boss has. This keeps bosses fair even if you are playing with multiple friends.
If you want to do PvP, try setting up an arena and challenge your friends to a one on one, where whoever can make the best loadout of accessories, armor, and weapons will win!
